snippet: Previous awards shows have seen a decline in ratings, so the pressure is on for officers and executives of the Academy as they select overseers of the next Oscars broadcast.
abstract: News Analysis; Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences is searching for new producer or producers to update and revitalize Academy Awards ceremony; broadcast saw 15 percent viewership decline and poor reviews in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Previous awards shows have seen a decline in ratings, so the pressure is on for officers and executives of the Academy as they select overseers of the next Oscars broadcast.
